title: Topaz bolts (e)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Enchanted red topaz bolts are steel bolts tipped with enchanted red topaz. Red topaz bolts can be enchanted through the spell Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz) by a player with level 29 Magic. The spell enchants 10 red topaz bolts at a time.

Item ID9239

Enchanted red topaz bolts are steel bolts tipped with enchanted red topaz. Red topaz bolts can be enchanted through the spell Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz) by a player with level 29 Magic. The spell enchants 10 red topaz bolts at a time.

Enchanted topaz bolts have a 4% chance of triggering the Down to Earth effect. This will lower the target's Magic by 1 level. The bolt effect can only be triggered while fighting other players.

If the player has completed the Hard Kandarin Diary, there is a 10% increase (bringing it to 4.4%) chance of the likelihood that the special effect of an enchanted bolt will occur. This effect is always active, regardless of whether the headgear is equipped.

Down to Earth
A player activates the Down to Earth effect

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 April 2015
(update)

Completing the Kandarin Hard Diary now increases the chance of enchanted bolt special effects activating by 10%, even without wearing Kandarin headgear 3.

5 March 2015
(update | poll)

The chance of enchanted bolt special effects activating is increased by 10% wearing Kandarin headgear 3.

18 June 2007
(update)

The item's value was increased from 1 to 24.

[[File:Topaz bolts (e) detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Enchanted red topaz bolts''' are [[steel bolts]] tipped with enchanted [[red topaz]]. [[Red topaz bolts]] can be enchanted through the spell [[Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Red Topaz)]] by a player with level 29 [[Magic]]. The spell enchants 10 red topaz bolts at a time.

Enchanted topaz bolts have a '''4%''' chance of triggering the '''''Down to Earth''''' effect. This will lower the target's [[Magic]] by 1 level. The bolt effect can only be triggered while fighting other players.

If the player has completed the [[Kandarin Diary#Hard|Hard Kandarin Diary]], there is a 10% increase (bringing it to '''4.4%''') chance of the likelihood that the special effect of an enchanted bolt will occur. This effect is '''always''' active, regardless of whether the headgear is equipped.
